entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:55 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 10:58 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then freezing rain or rain. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
